description: Kirishima Akari is the twin sister of http://anidb.net/ch11646 [Kotone] and the younger of the two. She, along with her sister, know that http://anidb.net/ch10840 [Junpei] is cursed. They do not become cursed as they have innate anti-magic abilities, but only for self protection. She is tsundere, and has the ability to sense the supernatural.
name: Kirishima Akari
